SELECT count(*) FROM nboard WHERE sort = 'F'

SELECT lead(unq,1,'0') over(order by rn) punq, lag(unq,1,'0') over(order by rn) nunq, b.* FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, a.* from ( SELECT unq, title, hits, to_char(rdate,'yyyy/mm/dd')rdate, content, sort FROM nboard WHERE title IS NOT NULL and sort = 'N'
and $s_field$ LIKE '%$s_text$%'
ORDER BY udate DESC)a )b WHERE rn BETWEEN $s_no$ and $e_no$

SELECT c.* FROM( SELECT lead(unq,1,'0') over(order by rn) punq, lag(unq,1,'0') over(order by rn) nunq, lead(title,1,'이전글이없습니다.') over(order by rn) ptitle, lag(title,1,'다음글이 없습니다.') over(order by rn) ntitle, b.* FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, a.* FROM ( SELECT unq, title, hits, to_char(rdate,'yyyy/mm/dd')rdate, content FROM nboard WHERE title IS NOT NULL and sort = 'N'
and $s_field$ LIKE '%$s_text$%'
ORDER BY udate DESC)a)b)c WHERE unq = #unq#

and $s_field$ LIKE '%$s_text$%'
ORDER BY udate DESC)a )b WHERE rn BETWEEN $s_no$ and $e_no$
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO nboard( unq, title, rdate, udate, content, sort) VALUES( nboard_seq.nextval, #title#, sysdate, sysdate, #content#, #sort# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE nboard SET title=#title#, content=#content#, udate = sysdate WHERE unq = #unq#
UPDATE nboard SET hits= hits+1 WHERE unq = #unq#
